Address.value: 1100 ALAKEA STREET,SUITE 500, HONOLULU, Hawaii, 96813-2840, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Barnwell Industries Inc is an oil and gas firm. Its areas of operations include acquiring, developing, producing, and selling oil and natural gas. The company's operating segment includes Oil and natural gas, Contract drilling, Land investment, and Others. It generates maximum revenue from the Oil and natural gas segment. It operates in two geographical segments the United States, which generates a majority of revenue; and Canada.
